title.vi: Ho tro 4K Upscale & Fix loi Download

summary.vi: Phien ban cap nhat quan trong tap trung vao chat luong video 4K va sua cac loi ton dong giup trai nghiem muot ma hon.
summary.en: Important update focusing on 4K video quality and fixing remaining bugs for smoother experience.

items.vi: Ho Tro Tai Video 4K (Upscale): Them tuy chon 4K vao menu. Tool tu dong chon "Upscale (4K)" va tang timeout len 10 phut de dam bao render hoan tat.
items.en: 4K Video Download Support (Upscale): Added 4K option to menu. Tool automatically selects "Upscale (4K)" and increases timeout to 10 minutes to ensure render completion.

items.vi: Cap Nhat Tab Image: Tinh nang Upscale anh (2K/4K) duoc cap nhat logic nhan dien moi, hoat dong on dinh hon.
items.en: Image Tab Update: Image Upscale feature (2K/4K) updated with new detection logic, more stable operation.

items.vi: Fix Loi "Download All": Da khac phuc viec Download All khong hoat dong voi video 4K. Gio day ban co the treo may tai toan bo video chat luong cao.
items.en: Fix "Download All" Bug: Fixed Download All not working with 4K videos. Now you can batch download all high-quality videos.

items.vi: Fix Loi Menu chong cheo: Sua loi tool chon nham "Upscale" khi nguoi dung chon "1080p". Logic nhan dien gio chinh xac 100% cho 720p, 1080p va 4K.
items.en: Fix Menu Overlap Bug: Fixed tool selecting wrong "Upscale" when user chose "1080p". Detection logic now 100% accurate for 720p, 1080p and 4K.

items.vi: Giao dien: Loai bo tuy chon GIF (270p) de tranh nham lan.
items.en: UI: Removed GIF (270p) option to avoid confusion.

items.vi: On dinh: Cai thien kha nang ket noi lai (Auto-reconnect) khi mang lag.
items.en: Stability: Improved auto-reconnect capability when network lags.
